## StoreConfig.product\_reviews\_enabled property

Indicates whether product reviews are enabled. Possible values: 1 (Yes) and 0 (No)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
product_reviews_enabled?: Maybe<Scalars['String']>;
```
